en.title: Personal Portfolio
en.text: Website built from scratch with HTML, CSS, JS and Python.

en.title: AiTomatic
en.text: Live prototype for AiTomatic. Built with Python and Typescript. Currently being developed.

en.title: Matrix Arcade
en.text: Mini Games arcade built with Typescript, Python and React. Showcase of games I created whilst learning.

en.title: Career Tracker Pro
en.text: React Native app for tracking professional experience, milestones, and career progression. Features timeline visualization, achievement badges, and goal setting.

en.title: Workflow Manager
en.text: Enterprise task management app built with .NET Core and Angular. Includes Kanban boards, time tracking, and team collaboration features.

en.title: SkillMatcher AI
en.text: AI-powered skills assessment and recommendation platform. Uses machine learning to match skills with job requirements and suggest learning paths.

en.title: Tech Stack Visualizer
en.text: Interactive D3.js visualization tool for displaying technology stacks, dependencies, and skill relationships. Perfect for portfolio presentations.

en.title: CodeBuddy Learning
en.text: Educational platform for learning programming through interactive challenges. Features real-time code execution, progress tracking, and peer collaboration.

en.title: CertManager Plus
en.text: Certification tracking app for IT professionals. Manages renewal dates, study materials, and provides exam preparation resources with AI-powered flashcards.

en.title: StudyBuddy AI
en.text: AI-powered study assistant that creates personalized learning plans, quizzes, and summaries from course materials. Integrates with popular learning platforms.

en.title: Course Tracker Pro
en.text: Comprehensive course management system for tracking online learning progress across multiple platforms. Features analytics dashboard and completion certificates.
